overview:
Gustavo has over 15 years of experience and passion for Internet and Information Technology; through his career he has hold several management and director positions with world leaders such as Banamex, AOL and Globus. As a Director of Business Development at Televisa, he was member of the startup team that created Esmas.com, a leader portal in Mexico. In Canada, Gustavo continues working in the Internet and Travel sectors, previously with Globus as Director of eBusiness and currently as Electronic Distribution Manager at Air Canada Vacations.

Gustavo has an Engineering degree from ITESM, an MBA from IPADE, and a Post-MBA in eBusiness from Schulich school of Business at York University. He is fluent in English and French.

Gustavo lives in Toronto with his wife and three daughters. He participates in triathlons during the summer and enjoys outdoors activities in the winter.
